title: Strengthening Software Development Practical Competencies: Designing High School and Vocational School Mathematics Education Through Blended Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can solve complex mathematical problems step-by-step by utilizing Superitem structures in a blended learning environment.
Learners improve mathematical thinking skills by over 20% through integrating digital platforms with face-to-face instruction.
Learners can establish and implement self-directed learning plans based on formative assessment feedback.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
